@import "Variables";
 
.coveo-facet-header {
  padding: 10px 20px;
  background: $color-blueish-white;
  clear: both;
  overflow: hidden;
  @include border-top-radius($default-border-radius);
  @include display(flex);
  @include flex-wrap(nowrap);
}
 
.coveo-facet-header-title-section {
  @include display(flex);
  @include flex-wrap(nowrap);
  @include flex-grow(1);
}
 
.coveo-facet-header-settings-section {
  @include display(flex);
  @include flex-wrap(nowrap);
  @include flex-grow(0);
}
 
.coveo-facet-header-title {
  color: $color-greyish-teal-blue;
  font-size: $font-size-regular;
}
 
.coveo-facet-settings-more {
  &:hover, &:focus {
    outline: none;

      fill-opacity: 1;
      fill: $color-blueish-white-grey;
    }
  }
}

}

  }

    fill: $color-active-yellow;
  }

    fill: $color-active-yellow;
  }
}

  cursor: pointer;
  margin-left: 10px;
  position: relative;
  top: 4px;
}
 
.coveo-facet-header-eraser {
  position: relative;
  top: 0px;
  visibility: hidden;

    visibility: visible;
  }
  @include clearButton('&', 'big');  
}

}
